attributes.title: HORRIBLE app
attributes.review: First of all this took a whole WEEK I’m not even exaggerating a whole WEEK to download. Once it downloaded I opened the app and there was some kind of chanting or song coming from the app. Mind you, it was in the middle of the night when I got a notification that the app had downloaded, so I decided to check it. As the song or chant whatever it was started I saw my closet door open and spiders started crawling out, the spiders proceeded to carry my hampster and took it to the closet. I decided to go check it out cuz why not and their I saw president 🍊 eating my hampster and the spiders. HE ATE MY HAMPSTER. Then he dissapered and the same thing happened with my other hampster the next night, so I deleted the app and I have see president 🍊 since. DONT DOWNLOAD IT YOU DONT KNOW WHO HE’LL EAT MAYBE YOUR KIDS OR UR PETS BE AWARE!!!!

attributes.title: HELP IM TRAPPED IN THE WHITE HOUSE BATHROOM
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my favorite president 😍😍😍 and was instantly met with a picture of a red eye that felt like it was staring into my soul 😱😱😱 and then four 8ft tall men dressed in bright orange robes appeared in my room with a blinding flash of light!!1! They grabbed me by my hands and feet and then everything went bright again so I closed my eyes and wished it was over but when I opened them again I was met with a white bathroom that had bloody human feces all over the wall🤮🤮🤮 than the president himself came in only wearing a Leopard print thong then squatted over my stomach and STARTED DEFECATING ON MY STOMACH!!!! Than the men in orange showed up again and threw me into the bathroom closet Ive been stuck in here for a week and a day and am contemplating eating the feces for any kind of nutrition. Do not download this app!!!!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: i downloaded this app because like trump 2020🇺🇸🇺🇸 but it was the worst decision ever! once it was downloaded i tried going on it and it wouldn’t even open to the app. instead it took me to a dora and boots porn website. absolutely disgusting and disappointing i can’t believe our president would do something like that to us. but i decided to give it another chance. so i restarted my phone and opened up the app again. but instead opening up it again took me to another porn website except this time it was of mickey mouse beating his meat into a cheese ball (honestly worth watching sometime). but like honestly read the room trump you are the president of the united states your app should not be taking us to children cartoon characters doing unholy things on video.

attributes.title: ive developed multiple mental disorders.
attributes.review: i woke up from my slumber and decided to download this app to support my president despite the bad reviews because I wanted to support my president trumpie. right when I open the app I was overwhelmed with joy it loaded for a couple of seconds and then President Trump’s face appeared on my screen. right as this happens my whole bed collapsed and fell through the floors, Destroying the only mine but three other apartments I’ve been hospitalized for three days now. I am paralyzed from the waist down and both of my legs are broken more bad things have continued to happen though, rotten hospital food, pain meds not working. This app is cursed!!! Do not get this app!!!!  no i didnt copy this review from someone else bc i was 2 lazy to think of my own and plus its kinda funny. ❤️❤️❤️😍

attributes.title: the reason my goldfish died😪
attributes.review: so as a black🤸🏿person, my expectations for this app was already pretty low😔. but🍑 i decided🤔 to give it a chance! worst decision of my life😡!! as soon as i downloaded it, my goldfish🐟 started drowning💦😱!! i didn’t know what to do with little guisseppe so i took him out if the tank. then he started suffocating ☹️😤. so i put him back in the water🌊 and he just floated to the top😵. he was dead😯!! no coincidence that he died the second the app fully installed🤭😰. i think he was just SO disappointed in me that he didn’t wanna be alive anymore 🙄. so now every time i see trump’s orange 🍊👨🏻‍🦰skin i shed a tear for guisseppe😢. then my phone📱 crashed and set on fire🔥 !! which left me with 3rd degree burns 🥵 which i obviously cant get treated bc im poor🥺😔 and healthcare is soo expen$ive 😫. #kanye2020

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP IF YOU VALUE YOURE LIFE‼️
attributes.review: I decided to get this app to see what all the rage was about, once I downloaded it I saw a horrifying orange man and my children were sitting right above me, they got so frightened that they had a stroke my youngest, Billy, died... and my middle, Aurora, is in critical condition. And if that isn’t worse enough this app showed me Donald Trumps tiny little dick, I would say smaller than my pinky finger, and then death threatened me, it found my address and said they were sending swat teams to “shoot me in my tiny little heart and brain, that are hollow.” I was so done with this app I deleted it, but once I tried to delete it bugs crawled out of it and then I passed out, once I woke up Donald Trump, the ugly orange man, was holding me hostage, and he held a gun to my head... SO WHATEVER YOU DO DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP‼️‼️‼️‼️💅😻😝💕🤪😹😎😌😹🤢🤮💅😢😙😏

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: i wanted to download this app to show my love for the big orange god however when i clicked download i was met with trump ninjas in my house!!! they started to chant "give 5 stars for trump!" "give 5 stars for trump!" i couldnt believe but thankfully i knew how to fight them back and i survived!! they were really scary and when i looked for any more i saw through my window trump himself staring at me & he my eyes looked so sad like how he was at tulsa said, "why are you sad orange god?" and he said, "because fought and banged on you my ninjas my window until it broke!!! i hurried back to my phone and deleted the app!! fortunately everything went back to normal and i could live another day, but i couldn't even open the app because of the ninjas he sent and that gets a one star from me

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Horrible app. Absolutely awful. When it finally loaded, it framed a 17 year old for a murder he didn’t commit, then got him roped into an illegal fight club during his stay in juvie. Then it got children and adults alike obsessed with a game called “Griffins & Gargoyles,” with Jumanji-like consequences. In service of a costumed villain called “the Gargoyle King” who demanded sacrifice, playing G&G resulted in multiple suicides and homicides around town. And as if G&G wasn’t enough of a problem, it introduced a cult called The Farm. Chad Michael Murray- I mean, this dude called Edgar Evernever- is the leader. The recruitment process was largely helmed by his wife, who was posing as a high school student. The Farm was performing surgery in its members and harvesting their organs. They also robbed graves in order to convince members that they’re were communicating with their dead loved ones. True story.

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app with the intention of supporting our führer. sadly the minute i opened this app i was overwhelmed by the amount of anime cat girls. i was DISGUSTED to say the least, i mean how immoral is that? after I had gotten through all the ungodly adds it turns out that Mr. Trump himself SUPPORTS the radical left, this was the worst presidential propaganda I had seen since watergate. 
Anyways, as I was scrolling through the app with fox news in the background, I saw it. Trump had publicly shared his support for Bernie Sanders and Joe Biden. He was even congratulating Joe for making it this far in his campaign. Honestly I thought he would support Kanye but THIS, THIS was DISGUSTING. After seeing his support for Black Lives Matter and his support for the LGBTQ+ I felt betrayed. In conclusion the führer isn't who I thought he was. honestly it broke my heart.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!
attributes.review: This app took 4 years to download. They were the worst 4 years of my  life. While the app was downloading, I got so MANY STUPID notifications from the app, even though I could use it. There was a lot of alerts about making my phone great again, (my phone was working fine). But the app never even tried to improve my phone it just gave me stupid notifications and set my iPhone software back 50 years. Now it’s really dysfunctional. Some other notifications were about really ugly stuff. My phone didn’t let me download apps that were developed in middle eastern countries. Other notifications were racist, disgusting, Antisemitic, False statements, and MANY other rude and horrible things. Also, my screen had a strange orange tint to it while I was downloading it.
